SELECT F.*, P.CHANGENAME AS thumbnail FROM FEED F LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT F_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY F_NO ORDER BY F_NO, PHOTO.CHANGENAME DESC) AS NUM, CHANGENAME FROM PHOTO) WHERE NUM =1)P ON (F.F_NO = P.F_NO) WHERE F.M_NO= #{mNo} AND F.F_STATUS='Y' UNION SELECT F.*,P.CHANGENAME AS thumbnail FROM FEED F LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT F_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY F_NO ORDER BY F_NO, PHOTO.CHANGENAME DESC) AS NUM, CHANGENAME FROM PHOTO) WHERE NUM =1)P ON (F.F_NO = P.F_NO) WHERE F.F_NO IN (SELECT SF_NO FROM SHARE_FEED WHERE SM_NO=#{mNo} and s_status='Y') AND F.F_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY 5 DESC
